title: Trust God's Timing | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Trust God's Timing | Joel Osteen
description:
In life, we're always waiting for something: a dream to come to pass, a problem to turn around. When it’s not happening as fast as we would like, it’s tempting to get frustrated. But the moment you prayed, God established a set time for your answer. You can relax and enjoy life as you wait for the promise. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
